name: #19: The Sun (Alpha Demo)
description:
Alpha demo for my newest project: #19: The Sun

This demo covers the basic mechanics of the combat aspect of the project.

---------------------------

WASD: Movement

Space: Jump

E: Interact

Left Click: Ranged Weapon

Right Click: Melee Weapon

Number Keys (1,2): Switch Ranged Ability

Esc: Quit Game

--------------------------------

Your feedback is crucial to the development of this project; Good or bad, please let me know what you think at:

lsddev21@gmail.com

lsddev.tumblr.com
